name: Branson Yost
text: Great people and place to do business

name: Hendri Van Tonder
text: The help is scarce

name: Conrad Turrentine
text: Great

name: Jimmy Parker
text: Good market

name: Stephanie Ledbetter
text: Okay. Seems to be more of a male friendly atmosphere instead male and female friendly atmosphere. I came a couple of times before my son passed last year which has been a different experience than when I am just with my daughter now. All of the stockyards have a buddy system. If you are not in their group, you may or may not get the raw end of the deal

name: Kelly Austin
text: Awesome auction for love stock.

name: Bruce Maddox
text: Great  people nice place to go  either buying or selling

name: Jim Lane
text: Best people and best place to sell your cattle. They really work hard for their customers.

name: Jason Heard
text: Best stockyard around my calf’s do there best here than any other sale barn..

name: Bo Bailey
text: Always the best place to sell cattle . People that own it are the best . Ain't nothing they won't do for good people.

name: farmall400ta
text: The Green's work hard and provide a great environment to sell cattle.

name: larry smith
text: Great folks always willing to help

name: Denise Todd
text: One of my favorite family outings...and my son LOVES the egg sandwiches at the restaurant.

name: Jo Copeland
text: Very good cattle sale.

name: Pat Mason
text: Good place to buy a cow

name: Jeff Tucker Sr.
text: Huge sell. Not a bunch of folks bidding stuff up to high.

name: Wendy Moore
text: Wish they had a cat walk to see all the animals

name: Ann Mills
text: Went to the vet office with the girls to get shots

name: Malcolm Rowland
text: Great

name: Kin Folk
text:
They sale the best cattle in Alabama.
You get the best price for your cattle.
There is a restaurant on site which has good food also🍔
This is a cattle stockyard only
They do overnight holding
For cattle haulers

name: Shane Carter
text: This is a great place to buy and sale cows! Very well organized, yes these folks know how to handle cattle. I was impressed with the friendly staff.

name: billy saucer
text: The people make the business, from checking in till cashing the check!

name: Brian Parsons
text: The staff at Mid State Stockyard are knowledgeable, courteous and friendly. They will go out of their way to insure that you get the catlle that you are looking for. As a regional stockyard, cattle from a wide area come to sell. This insures a wide selection of cows, calves, heifers, steers and bulls to choose from. With sale every Wednesday, and if purchasing, you are able to settle the newbies in before the weekend. A win win situation for the cows and the buyers. Head on down to Letohatchee, Alabama home of Mid State Stockyard, LLC. You will be glad you did!

name: [ZeRo] (Zerokool4.2.0)
text: Arrived late. They left the lights on. Easy to find the cows

name: Buckshot Tallant
text: Top notch!

name: Herman Norwood
text: Good Food

name: Carl Jackson
text: Nice place

name: Michael Corning
text: very fast the way cattle came thru well treated needed higher prices for the cows an calves.Not management fault on that.

name: Terry N McAardle
text:
They keep SAFTY FIRST THEN
CUSTOMERS HAPPY AS MUCH
AS THEY CAN!!!
Life is ruff Keeps Beef Moving
A LONG GOD'S HIGHWAYS!!!
THANKS TO ALL!!!

name: vaylgar
text: Best place for selling cattle in the surrounding area for at least 3 hours in each direction

name: paul peters
text: Overall, a good experience.

name: James Wheeler
text: Good food,  great service   only 2 days a week

name: Chan Elliott
text: Great cafe for a good local lunch. We go every Sunday after church. They also have the livestock sale every Monday. Great people go see them.

name: Will Whitfield
text: Always friendly hometown service with a good professional touch.

name: chandler elliott jr
text: Been going here for along long time. We also eat in the cafe on Sundays from time to time

name: luke manning
text: You can smell the manure and the options were few

name: Heather Allen
text: First time buyers! Very friendly service!

name: Donald Taylor
text: Nice place

name: nancy miles
text: Very busy

name: Monica Brown
text: They are Always happy to help, restaurant is great.

name: Nathanael Burnett
text: Really enjoyed the auction! Lots of chickens, calves and goats. Cafe food was good. Auctioner used quite a bit more inappropriate language than I was comfortable with as my wife, children and grandchildren were with me.

name: Shelley Sundberg
text: Very loud. And bought what they said were 2 hens. One crows, sooooo lol

name: Shannon Barnett
text: Never a dull moment.

name: Russell Kelly
text: Always a fun hour

name: Bobby Wiggins
text: Love just hanging out and great food

name: Kelley Smith
text: Great sale

name: Tom Mills
text: In my opinion, It no longer feels community minded. Very different from what I'm used to. New management is to totalitarian for my taste. Otherwise, it does seem to run smoothly. For me, its just backwards.

name: Kin Folk
text: This is Escambia county stockyard were they auction off cattle chickens goats and pigs and sometimes have a junk sale and these people are fantastic

name: Heather Gartner
text: We love the staff, convenient access, great location and always very helpful they also provide our Excede internet service so it's all in one!!!😉☺️☺️

name: bob kiser
text: Fri ed ndly people good deals for the taking of you look

name: Agnes Jones
text: Disappointed in the new way it is being run with everything having to go through the ring. Used to enjoy talking to the people selling things and being able to touch the animals.

name: Jack Skellington
text: Nice facility with plenty of room inside and out

name: David McDonald
text: Good people

name: Michael Hunter
text: Nice

name: Payton Wolfe
text: Love this place just slow slow lines

name: Juanita Grooms
text: Good family fun,lots of livestock and clean bathrooms,always a great time,lots of friends to meet..
